text: pasuva apagē vahalūngen api tōrā gat ayava ema dharmayanṭa himi aya bavaṭa pat kaḷemu. ehet ovungen samaharek (eyaṭa venaskam kara), tamanṭa tamanma hāniyak kara gatha. ovungen (venat) samaharek madhyastha mārgayehi gaman gatha. ovungen (tavat) samaharek nam, allāhgē niyōgayanṭa anuva dæhæmi kāraṇāvanhi idiriyenma siṭinnāha. eyama ati viśāla bhāgyayak vannēya
